title: Replica out of sync
description:
Hi,
in a production environment made of 1 leader and 1 replica, it's the second time in 20 days that the replica goes out of sync. With "out of sync" I mean that the leader has 60439 documents and the replica has only 2 documents!
In the solr's logs I didn't find any error; it seems that the system is ok.
Have you ever experienced a problem like that one?
How can I resync the two nodes without reindexing all?

If needed, I can send logs and the index of the replica.

Thanks for your support.

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: Federico, please ask questions on the solr-user mailing list instead
